location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from George Swinton, Personal Secretary to Government, to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Swinton writes to state that a carriage and harnesses (to fit two horses) have been dispatched to Ibrahim Khan, Governor of Kirman [Kerman], on board the ship Eliza. Swinton finishes by stating that a duplicate of the letter will be delivered to Bruce by Captain Woodhead of the Eliza. A postscript from Swinton requests Bruce use this letter in place of one of the same date (folio 14), which contains a mistake, naming the wrong ship used to dispatch the carriage and harnesses.
